com.petpet.c3po.api.gatherer
Interface MetaDataGatherer

All Superinterfaces:
Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalFileGatherer
public interface MetaDataGatherer
extends Runnable

An interface for a meta data gatherer. The implementing class could be a filesystem gatherer or some specific repository gatherer.

Author:
Petar Petrov
